dublinCore.dc:title: 119 HR 776 IH: Nutria Eradication and Control Reauthorization Act of 2025
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Harder of California (for himself, Mr. Valadao, and Mr. Garamendi) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Natural Resources

form.official-title: To reauthorize the Nutria Eradication and Control Act of 2003.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Nutria Eradication and Control Reauthorization Act of 2025.

section.header: Reauthorization of Nutria Eradication and Control Act of 2003

subsection.text: Section 3(e) of the Nutria Eradication and Control Act of 2003 (16 U.S.C. 8102(e)) is amended by striking 2025 and inserting 2030.
Section 3(a) of the Nutria Eradication and Control Act of 2003 (16 U.S.C. 8102(a)) is amended by striking Secretary), and inserting Secretary).
